meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a baboon.
meanings.sent1: The baboonish face paint made the child look like a monkey.
meanings.sent2: Her baboonish features included a long snout and sharp teeth.
meanings.sent3: The baboonish costume at the party was a hit with the kids.
meanings.sent4: His baboonish behavior at the zoo drew curious stares from other visitors.
meanings.sent5: The baboonish expression on his face made him appear wild and untamed.

meanings.definition: Behaving in a manner similar to a baboon.
meanings.sent1: The baboonish way he swung from the tree branches amazed the onlookers.
meanings.sent2: She let out a baboonish screech when she saw the spider on the wall.
meanings.sent3: His baboonish antics during the game brought laughter to the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The baboonish aggression in his voice startled everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: Watching him eat with such baboonish speed was both amusing and impressive.
